numbered_ace_sentences: 2. Baseball is the only listed sport that has a list for managers.
3. Baseball does not have a list for head coaches.
4. Baseball is the only listed sport in which people of color are a minority among the players.
5. Baseball is the only listed sport in which people of color are a minority among the managers.
6. In every listed sport, less than 50% of head coaches are people of color.
7. In every listed sport except baseball, people of color are a majority among the players.
8. I wonder why MLB does not have a chart for head coaches.
9. I wonder why people of color are a minority in baseball.
10. I wonder why there are not many coaches who are people of color in all sports.
11. In most sports, people of color are a majority among the players.
13. My community includes many people of color.
14. Many people of color in my community want a career in league sports in the future.
15. The graph suggests that discrimination based on background does not happen.
16. Many league players may have experiences with racism.
17. Some league players still succeed despite racism.
18. The headline is: Diversity in sports players.
